replies.text: Hi. I'm To Do bot. I can help you manage your To Do, Shopping or Grocery list.
replies.speak: Hi. I'm To Do bot. I can help you manage your To Do, Shopping or Grocery list.

suggestedActions: Mark the second task as completed

replies.text: I can read out your To Do's, shopping or grocery items, create a new To Do, shopping or grocery item, or complete and delete a To Do, shopping or grocery item for you.
